choices.name: Human
choices.description: <pronoun> is a human, and is known for their adaptability and versatility. They can thrive in different locations and cultures, and possess a great drive for progress and innovation. Humans are often depicted as ambitious and resourceful, but can also be prone to greed and prejudice.

choices.name: Elf
choices.description: <pronoun> is an elf, known for their grace and elegance. They possess a natural affinity for magic, and have a deep connection to the natural world. Elves are often portrayed as peaceful and wise, but can also be haughty and aloof. They are known to live longer than humans and have a keen sense of hearing and vision.

choices.name: Dwarf
choices.description: <pronoun> is a dwarf, known for their sturdy and dependable nature. Dwarves are renowned for their skill in crafting and mining, as well as their love of ale and gold. They are often depicted as stubborn and hard-working, but can also be greedy and miserly. Dwarves are typically shorter than humans and have a strong resistance to poison and disease.

choices.name: Orc
choices.description: <pronoun> is an orc, known for their fierce and formidable nature. Their brutal strength makes them feared by many, but they are also depicted as having a code of honor. Though often portrayed as evil, some orcs may have a more noble and honorable side. They are known to have a natural toughness and endurance, but may also be hot-headed and prone to violence.

choices.name: Goblin
choices.description: <pronoun> is a goblin, known for their cunning and mischievous nature. They have a knack for mechanics and a love of causing trouble, and often work as thieves or mercenaries. Goblins are often portrayed as small and cunning, but also as greedy and selfish. They are known for their quick reflexes and agility, but may also be cowardly and untrustworthy.

choices.name: Warrior

choices.name: Mage
choices.description: <pronoun> is a mage, a wielder of magic and arcane knowledge. <pronoun> is able to cast spells and summon creatures, and is often sought after for <possessive_pronoun> power and wisdom.

choices.name: curly medium hair
choices.description: <pronoun> has a head of curly, medium-length hair. The curls are bouncy and defined, and the hair has a lot of volume and movement.

choices.name: straight long hair
choices.description: <pronoun> has long, straight hair that falls to <possessive_pronoun> waist. The hair is smooth and shiny, and has a sleek, polished look.

choices.description: <pronoun> has short, wavy hair that is cut just above the ears. The waves are loose and messy, giving the hair a laid-back, casual appearance.

choices.name: pixie cut
choices.description: <pronoun> has a pixie cut, which is a very short, choppy haircut with layers. The hair is shorter at the back and sides, and a bit longer on top. It has a edgy, modern look.

choices.name: updo
choices.description: <pronoun> has <possessive_pronoun> hair styled in an updo, which is a hairstyle where the hair is pinned up at the top of the head, leaving little or no hair hanging down. It's a formal, elegant style often worn to special occasions.

choices.name: french braid
choices.description: <pronoun> has a french braid, which is a type of braid that starts at the back of the head and is made by adding sections of hair to the braid as it is braided. It has a chic, sophisticated look.

choices.name: cornrows
choices.description: <pronoun> has cornrows, which is a hairstyle where the hair is divided into thin braids and braided close to the scalp, forming parallel rows. It's a traditional hairstyle with African origins.

choices.name: dreadlocks
choices.description: <pronoun> has dreadlocks, which are thick braids of hair that resemble ropes. They are created by braiding the hair and allowing it to mat and tangle over time.

choices.name: afro
choices.description: <pronoun> has an afro, which is a hairstyle where the hair is combed up and out, forming a sphere of voluminous hair. It's a bold, distinctive style often associated with the African-American community.

choices.name: curly bob
choices.description: <pronoun> has a curly bob, which is a short haircut with layers and curls. The hair is cut to the jawline or just below, and the curls are bouncy and defined. It has a fun, playful look.

choices.name: side swept bangs
choices.description: <pronoun> has side swept bangs, which are a type of fringe that is swept to the side. The bangs are cut straight across the forehead and then brushed to one side, covering part of the forehead. They add a touch of glamour and femininity to the hairstyle.

choices.name: bun
choices.description: <pronoun> has <possessive_pronoun> hair styled in a bun, which is a hairstyle where the hair is gathered and twisted into a knot at the back or top of the head. It can be a low bun at the nape of the neck, a mid-level bun at the crown of the head, or a high bun at the top of the head. It's a versatile, elegant style that can be worn for formal or casual occasions.

choices.name: ponytail
choices.description: <pronoun> has <possessive_pronoun> hair styled in a ponytail, which is a hairstyle where the hair is gathered and secured with a hair tie at the back of the head. The ponytail can be high, mid-level, or low, and can be worn smooth and sleek or with volume and texture. It's a simple, practical style that is easy to create and maintain.

choices.name: Bowl Cut
choices.description: It is a simple, short cut that resembles a bowl, often worn by commoners and peasants.

choices.name: Ripped Shirt
choices.description: He has a ripped shirt made of rough cotton or linen, a common sign of poverty or rough living conditions. The holes and tears have been roughly patched up, but the fabric is still visibly frayed.

choices.name: Tunic
choices.description: He is wearing a knee-length tunic made of a coarse wool or linen fabric. The tunic has a simple cut with a loose fit, and the hem and sleeves are typically left unfinished. The tunic is fastened at the neck with a simple cord and has a plain design, typical of clothing worn by peasants and lower-class citizens.

choices.name: Chainmail
choices.description: He is wearing a chainmail shirt made of interlocking metal rings. The chainmail covers his torso and reaches down to his hips, providing protection against swords, axes, and other weapons. The rings are carefully woven together to create a flexible yet durable armor, and the shirt is worn over a padded gambeson for added comfort and protection.

choices.name: Leather Armor
choices.description: He is wearing leather armor made from tanned hide. The armor consists of a breastplate, shoulder plates, and greaves for the legs, all designed for mobility and flexibility. The leather is treated to resist water and wear, and the armor is fastened with laces or buckles at the side.

choices.name: Robe
choices.description: He is wearing a long, flowing robe made of a heavy wool or silk fabric. The robe is a deep, rich color and is trimmed with intricate embroidery or fur. The robe is fastened at the waist with a cord or sash, and the sleeves are wide and full, often reaching the floor. The robe is commonly worn by members of the clergy or other dignitaries as a symbol of their status and authority.

choices.name: Doublet
choices.description: He is wearing a close-fitting, short jacket called a doublet. The doublet is made of a luxurious fabric, such as velvet or silk, and is often heavily decorated with buttons, trim, or other embellishments. The doublet is worn over a shirt and is a popular choice for nobles and other members of the upper class.

choices.name: Cloak
choices.description: He is wearing a long, flowing cloak that is draped over his shoulders. The cloak is made of a warm fabric, such as wool or fur, and is fastened at the neck with a brooch or clasp. The cloak provides protection from the elements and is a common garment for travelers or those who spend a lot of time outdoors.

choices.name: Breeches
choices.description: He is wearing a pair of close-fitting pants called breeches. The breeches are made of a sturdy fabric, such as leather or canvas, and are worn to provide additional protection and warmth to the legs. The breeches are typically worn with tall boots or hose and a tunic or doublet.

choices.name: Hose
choices.description: He is wearing a pair of tight-fitting pants called hose. The hose are made of a stretchy fabric, such as wool or silk, and are worn to provide a snug fit and improved mobility. The hose are typically worn with a tunic or doublet and a pair of tall boots.

choices.name: Crown
choices.description: He is wearing a crown made of gold or silver, set with precious gems and adorned with intricate designs. The crown is a symbol of royalty and signifies the wearer's status as a monarch or ruler. The crown is typically worn on formal occasions and during coronations.

choices.name: Metal Armor
choices.description: He is wearing a suit of armor made of steel or other metal. The armor provides protection from weapons and is typically worn by soldiers, knights, and other warriors. The armor may include a helmet, gauntlets, greaves, a breastplate, and other components, all of which are designed to provide maximum protection.

choices.name: Warrior's Tunic

The warrior's tunic provides protection and mobility to the wearer, who is likely a soldier, knight, or other fighter. The tunic is typically worn with breeches, boots, and a belt to carry weapons and other equipment.
